title: War of the Roses: A Heart Drawn on His Window
description: Phoebe is concerned her boyfriend is cheating on her because she saw a heart drawn onto the window on the passenger side of his car and she thinks only a girl would do that.  She's scarred from the past with other guys who have cheated including one that shoved her in the basement for 4 hours when his girlfriend came home so she wants to get to the bottom of this!
itunes:summary: Phoebe is concerned her boyfriend is cheating on her because she saw a heart drawn onto the window on the passenger side of his car and she thinks only a girl would do that.  She's scarred from the past with other guys who have cheated including one that shoved her in the basement for 4 hours when his girlfriend came home so she wants to get to the bottom of this!
